name: Garda
description:
Garda is a 2d pixel art tower defense and exploration game. Protect your totem that is keeping your world out of the darkness. Wander across an immense desert. Learn about the weird laws of this world by using technology and energy systems to power defense turrets against the numerous enemies…

Learn why you are here, where do you come from, what can you do to stop the menace and god knows what is going to happen to you…

Features


Local multiplayer: play with up to 4 wisps fighting along your side

Simplistic base building: build a big base with different materials and block types

3 bosses that could really be a pain for you if underprepared

Rewarding exploration map: unlock more secrets and abilities as you progress in the hot desert

Unlock a new endless mode for more fun!

Resources management: manage where your resources are going to be moved, stocked, and sorted

Upgrade along the waves: upgrade your totem and the player with better or new abilities
